system.description:
Your visions give you the insight you need to do exactly the right thing at the right time. When you use your future sight to know what's coming, you may choose a spell from below, then mark it. You cannot use a spell while it is marked.

When you spend Food, remove a mark from one spell.

When you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.special-moves.Item.F7xvgmNVwAhxU9q9]{Recover}, remove all marks on your spells.

  • Right Place: You or an ally are standing in the perfect spot to do exactly what needs to be done.
  • Right Time: You take action with perfect timing, giving you a 10+ result on your next roll.
  • Butterfly Effect: Your small action before has set up the perfect chain of events to give an ally Hope on their roll.
